text: allah tana anugrahanto prasadincina danilo lobham vahince varu, tamakadi (lobhame) melainadani bhavinca radu, vastavaniki adi vari koraku ento hanikaramainadi. Varu tama lobhatvanto kudabettinadanta, tirpu dinamuna vari medala cuttu kattabadutundi. Mariyu bhumyakasala varasatvam allah ke cendutundi. Mariyu miru cestunnadanta allah erugunu
